definition: waiting to see a doctor/awaiting treatment
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: A man sitting in the waiting-room wanted to see the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 在候診室中坐着的男人想找醫生看病。

sentences.english: A few people stood inside the waiting area, some of them crying. iReport.com
sentences.chinese: 僅有幾人站在候診區守候，其中有人在哭泣。

sentences.english: We call it the dentist's waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以堪稱牙醫的候診室。

sentences.english: Please wait in the waiting room.
Jake sat in the waiting room, unsure about going in or not.
sentences.chinese: 傑克坐在候診室，不知道是否該進去。

sentences.english: Get in early and you’ll spend less time in the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 早晨來看醫生就不會在候診室多花時間。

sentences.english: The little patient accompanied by his parents was sitting at the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 那位小病人由他父母陪同，坐在候診室裏。

sentences.english: As we sat in the waiting room, I was overwhelmed by a sense of guilt.
sentences.chinese: 當我們坐在候診室，我被一陣愧疚感淹沒了。

sentences.english: So there were many patients in the doctor's waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 因此許多人在醫生的候診室裏靜靜地等着。

sentences.english: No patients sit in his waiting room. No receptionist answers the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 沒有病人在候診室裏，也沒有接電話的前臺接待員。

sentences.english: Why do patients have to sit so long in the waiting room?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼患者總要在候診室等那麼久？

sentences.english: Back in 1998, "there were many patients in the waiting room with deformities from their rheumatoid arthritis", he says.
sentences.chinese: “候診室裏有許多因風溼性關節炎造成畸形的患者”。

sentences.english: You are in the waiting room and this is the noise you hear through the door.
sentences.chinese: 在牙科候診室裏聽見牙鑽磨牙的聲音，讓人痛苦不堪。

sentences.english: I looked out at the family huddled by the Christmas tree.
sentences.chinese: 我把目光轉向候診室的那家人，他們都擠在聖誕樹下。

sentences.english: We took turns joining the Christmas party in the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 我們輪流地在候診室參加了這個聖誕節聚會。

sentences.english: She turned and, with a smile, guided her brood into the waiting room.
sentences.chinese: 她轉身帶着微笑，帶着她的一家子走進候診室。

definition: see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
(Tw) medical checkup/physical examination (abbr. for 健康檢查|健康检查[jian4 kang1 jian3 cha2])
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
to visit a patient at home (of a doctor)/house call
